Ending violence against women and protecting women and children should not be a partisan issue. 

But unfortunately Speaker Pelosi and House Democrats have made it one.

html: A clean extension gives Republicans and Democrats time to work together to pass a truly bipartisan and noncontroversial long-term reauthorization of VAWA, just as Congress has done many times before.
text: A clean extension gives Republicans and Democrats time to work together to pass a truly bipartisan and noncontroversial long-term reauthorization of VAWA, just as Congress has done many times before.

html: We all know that the bill Speaker Pelosi has put on the floor today is highly unlikely to pass the Senate and be signed into law However, this MTR could pass the House, the Senate, and be signed into law this week.

html: These are more than just numbers. These are our mothers… Sisters… Daughters… Friends… And Colleagues. My Motion to Recommit would extend VAWA through 2020 in order to continue critical services that protect millions of women, girls, and children across our country.
text:
These are more than just numbers.

These are our mothers…
Sisters…
Daughters…
Friends…
And Colleagues.

My Motion to Recommit would extend VAWA through 2020 in order to continue critical services that protect millions of women, girls, and children across our country.

html: I oppose government shutdowns and in Congress have consistently voted to keep the government open. That’s why I voted to fund the government this week with additional funding for border security and disaster aid.
text: I oppose government shutdowns and in Congress have consistently voted to keep the government open. That’s why I voted to fund the government this week with additional funding for border security and disaster aid.

html: The next Secretary of Defense must uphold his commitment to strengthening our alliances and preserving U.S. leadership.
text: The next Secretary of Defense must uphold his commitment to strengthening our alliances and preserving U.S. leadership.

html: As a Member of the House Armed Services Committee, he has been a strong partner for those of us who believe that the U.S. must continue to lead to counter rising threats from adversaries like Russia and China.

I’m cosponsoring two pieces of legislation to fight algal blooms by increasing research and providing resources to protect our natural ecology. html: I'm saddened to hear of the sudden passing of MP Gord Brown. Gord was deeply committed to the US-Canadian relationship and I was proud to partner with him on many issues. His loss will be felt deeply on this side of the border, and my prayers go out to his family.
text: I'm saddened to hear of the sudden passing of MP Gord Brown. Gord was deeply committed to the US-Canadian relationship and I was proud to partner with him on many issues. His loss will be felt deeply on this side of the border, and my prayers go out to his family.
